item.title: Are you using Open-DNS?
item.description: You should be using Open-DNS, if you answer yes to one of the following: Are you frustrated with crazy-long wait times before even the website url shows up? Is your ISP is a cheapo-*#$% using a crappy machine for DNS, and you wait enough to count the seconds between pressing enter and the little thingy on the browser status bar says “done”? Are you subject to phishing attacks? Do you want peace of mind?
